title: Sound Help
body: Can someone help, every time I play league I like to play music but the sound is muffled and its really bad hearing it. Does anyone know how to fix?

replies.body: Do you mean in-game sound or through another application?  You could try running a repair with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in case of any bad files, but I also suggest checking your sound brand's drivers to make sure they're up to date.  I hope that helps, but let me know.
